perspective_analysis.description: Different aspects where sources show different perspectives. Can be empty if coverage is similar.

aspect.description: What aspect differs between sources. Examples: 'Economic Impact', 'Root Causes', 'Primary Focus', 'Tone'. Keep it short and clear.

approaches.description: Different approaches sources take on this aspect. Minimum 2 approaches to show a difference.

focus.description: Brief description of what this group of sources focuses on. Keep it concise.
